job description:
Job Description
Data Analyst / Developer role. Initially for the planning phase execution of the Data Transformation projects around the Data Warehouse platform. Must be literate and able to document current state as well as future state requirements. May have to review SQL code or use ETL tools to identify current state mappings. Resource may move on to Design and other project tasks. Some resources may be considered for FTW conversion.

Job description:

Description:

Data Warehouse Data Analyst / Developer role. This position will have a strong understanding of the following areas:
  • Financial markets and instruments
  • Data Warehouse methodologies
  • AWS and cloud environments
  • Agile and waterfall SDLC practices
The resource may play a role as a data analyst as well as a data ETL developer
Company Description
At Pyramid Consulting, Inc. We Find Hidden Talent. Pyramid Consulting provides rewarding career opportunities for Business Professionals and enables our Clients to compete and win in today’s technology-driven global markets. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Atlanta, GA, Pyramid supports our Client partners around the world, including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom*, European Union* and India* through a combination of local offices and global delivery.
